site.title: GitHub Profile Analyzer
site.description: Analyze your GitHub profile, get scored, and receive development recommendations. Get detailed analysis across different criteria and evaluate your profile with a comprehensive dashboard.

detailedAnalysis.title: Detailed Analysis
detailedAnalysis.description: Comprehensive scoring across activity, contribution, popularity, quality, and diversity criteria.

smartRecommendations.title: Smart Recommendations
smartRecommendations.description: Personalized recommendations and insights to improve your profile.

visualDashboard.title: Visual Dashboard
visualDashboard.description: Rich modern dashboard interface with graphs and metrics.

insights.title: Insights
insights.noData: Not enough data yet. Insights will appear as you develop more activity and projects.
insights.description: These insights show the strengths of your GitHub profile. You can further strengthen your profile by maintaining and developing these features.
insights.locked: Star the project to unlock insights
insights.lockedDescription: Star and follow the project on GitHub to see these insights.

recommendations.title: Development Recommendations
recommendations.noRecommendations: Perfect! No specific recommendations for your profile. Continue to maintain your current performance.
recommendations.description: By following these recommendations, you can improve your GitHub profile and achieve a more professional appearance.
recommendations.locked: Star the project to unlock recommendations
recommendations.lockedDescription: Star and follow the project on GitHub to see these recommendations.
